list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: easy to mold, cut, compress, or fold; not hard or firm to the touch.
having a pleasing quality involving a subtle effect or contrast rather than sharp definition.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the soft glow of the lamps
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ánh sáng mềm mại của đèn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: sympathetic, lenient, or compassionate, especially to a degree perceived as excessive; not strict or sufficiently strict.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the administration is not becoming soft on crime
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chính quyền không trở nên mềm mại về tội phạm

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: all they had was ginger ale and a few other soft drinks
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tất cả những gì họ có là Ginger Ale và một vài loại nước ngọt khác

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a market, currency, or commodity) falling or likely to fall in value.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: now a new factor looms: soft oil prices
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bây giờ là một yếu tố mới hiện ra: Giá dầu mềm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of water) containing relatively low concentrations of dissolved calcium and magnesium salts and therefore lathering easily with soap.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he must be going soft in the head
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy phải mềm mại trong đầu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a consonant) pronounced as a fricative (as c in ice ).

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I can just speak soft and she'll hear me
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi chỉ có thể nói mềm và cô ấy sẽ nghe tôi
